title: THE ZHYONAS F0R ADC
body: they need a zhonya for the role adc or it will die out with the op late game mela champions do you agree

replies.body: You could just have a bard support

lol real talk my friend was playing jhin and he was like "wtf do i build last?" and I was like "dude get a zhonyas" and his AD was already so high it just worked out.

It certainly would add some tactical depth to the adc play style, though zhonyas has more uses on mages who often have aoe effects that last during the stasis.

Also dear god I don't need to see tryndamere with an invulnerability.

People Fear change.  This would be a big change.  I for one think this would add some interesting build choices depending on what the said ADC Zhyonas item gave for stats.  I think it would be key that the said item has no crit or AS and just gives a small AD boost or a modest conditional AD boost.
We have qss, ap can have zhonyas
